alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:23PM CDT until June 05 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 322 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 20 miles south of Medicine Lake, or 32 miles northwest of Mullen, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sevenmile Hill and Speckel Meir Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
